name: Manafinder
storyline: Aevi is a beautiful but unforgiving world where only one kingdom exists, blessed by the protection of the manastones: Manahill. Take the role of Lambda as you are exiled from Manahill, and become a manafinder to seek manastones that can protect the precarious settlement of exiles. As manastones become scarcer, the few remaining involve braving into the wilds and fighting powerful beasts. As the job becomes harder, and as other external forces threaten the future of the settlement, hope starts becoming but a fleeting dream. Can Lambda achieve a miracle?
summary: Take the role of Lambda as you are exiled from Manahill and thrown into the beautiful but unforgiving world of Aevi in this Japanese-style turn-based pixel-art RPG. Become a manafinder and seek the manastones as you battle against ferocious beasts and other threats as you fight for the survival of the exiles.
